title: Herb-Drug Interactions in Oncology
cleaned_text: No hay productos en el carrito Herb-Drug Interactions in Gubili, J. 2ª Edición Julio 2010 Inglés Tapa blanda 680 pags 1600 gr 16 x 23 x 3 cm ISBN 9781607950417 Editorial PEOPLE'S MEDICAL PUBLISHING HOUSE (PMPH) LIBRO IMPRESO 57,19 €54,33 €IVA incluido Recíbelo en un plazo De 2 a 3 semanas OVERVIEW The book provides science-based information about herbal remedies for the medical community. Each herb or remedy description is accompanied by information as to its origin, most common uses, benefits and risks/dangers. The book will provide detailed over 250 herb remedy was developed through careful and critical reviews of in pharmacy, botanicals and therapies. Each in terms of the following sections: common summary and critique and notes. This book has the look and feel of a fine field guide to medicinal plants, thanks to the beautiful drawings by Angela Donato and it will be of interest to a wide audience beyond the medical specialists, Integrative Medicine Service Memorial Sloan-Ketting Cancer Center New York, New York K. Simon Yeung, MBA, PharmD, LAc Clinical Coordinator & Research Pharmacist, Integrative Medicine Service Sloan-Kettering Center New York, New York Jyothirmai Gubili, Editor Integrative Medicine Service Memorial Sloane Kettering Cancer Center New York, New York [Tel 91 593 99 99](tel:003491 593 99 99) Fax 91 448 21 88 [Dir](/contacto) C/ Artesanos, 46 C/ Artesanos, 46 Parque Empresarial Prado del Espino 28660 Boadilla del Monte Madrid [Mailinfo@axon.es](mailto:info@axon.es)
